item.title: Whats wrong with this teleporting book?
item.dc:creator: @I_Samn_I I Samn I
item.description:
@I_Samn_I wrote:

if(itemID == 3829)
{
if(actionTimer == 0) {
sendMessage(“message”);
actionName = “[read]”;
actionTimer = 01;
setAnimation(132);
teleportToX = 3333;
teleportToY = 2222;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
}

Try that?

item.title: Whats wrong with this teleporting book?
item.dc:creator: @try_again try again
item.description:
@try_again wrote:

Yo, i tried to make a book so when i read it it teleports me to certain co-ords, whats wrong with this ?

case 3829 :
if(actionTimer == 0) {
sendMessage("message);
actionName = "[read]";
actionTimer = 01;
setAnimation(132);
teleportToX = 3333;
teleportToY = 2222;
updateRequired = true; 
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

I get no errors when i compile but when I read the book it wont teleport me Anyone see any problems?

Read full topic
